title: Chhota Bheem: Master of Shaolin
short_cast: Pooja Punabi, Mausam, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Parigna Pandya
cast: Pooja Punabi, Mausam, Julie Tejwani, Rupa Bhimani, Jigna Bhardwaj, Rajesh Kava, Parigna Pandya
m_desc: Suitable for children 7 and above and under parental guidance for persons under age of 7
desc: Summoned by a monk to help reclaim a temple from a dangerous leader, Bheem must master the Shaolin kung fu techniques if he wants a fighting chance!
